response_bytes = b""
while True:
    chunk = client.recv(4096)
    if not chunk:
        break
    response_bytes+=chunk
client.close()
response = response_bytes.decode('utf-8', errors='ignore')
response_header, response_body = response.split('\r\n\r\n',1)
